projects.title: VIDEO HUB
projects.description: This project shows sample videos along with other elements like dark-mode, slideshow, uploading, login and signup.

projects.title: CART
projects.description: An ecommerce shopping cart allows customers to easily add and remove products, change the quantity and get a total cost before finishing the transaction.

projects.title: REVIEWS
projects.description: An online review is an opinion of a product or service, written by someone who has used it. Online reviews are increasingly essential to decision making.

projects.title: MENU
projects.description: Online Menu - Simple, Contactless, Paper-free is a digital platform offered to food businesses. Customers can visit the URL and access the restaurant menu.

projects.title: GROCERY LIST
projects.description: Make grocery shopping easier and more efficient by adding, removing and modifying the online grocery list. It will help to make your next grocery trip stress-free!
